name: Love is a Battlefield DX
description:
Love Is A Battlefield is a bullet hell/dating sim mashup originally created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41 ("Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"). Overcome the insecurities of your date, and convince her to open her heart to you through the power of love.

This is the DX version, featuring improved graphics and sound, two difficulty levels, and a whole bunch of bug fixes.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z: Select
  • X: Back
